overview: A beautifully simple todo app inspired by Things 3. Single list, title-only items, LocalStorage persistence. Focus on clean aesthetics, generous whitespace, and subtle animations.
successMetrics: User can add, complete, and clear todos in under 2 seconds each
UI feels calm and polished like Things 3
uiNotes: Things 3 inspired: clean, minimal, generous whitespace
Completed section at bottom with 'Clear completed' button
No empty state message - just show input
rules: New todos appear at top of active list
Completing a todo moves it to Completed section at bottom
Clear completed removes all completed todos from storage
Enter key submits new todo, Escape clears input

stories.title: Project scaffold with Vite + Svelte + Tailwind
stories.description: As a developer, I want the project scaffolded so I can start building.
acceptanceCriteria: Run `bun create vite . --template svelte-ts` to scaffold
Install deps: `bun add -d tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer`
Run `bunx tailwindcss init -p` to create config files
Configure tailwind.config.js content paths for Svelte
Add Tailwind directives to src/app.css
Install eslint + prettier: `bun add -d eslint prettier eslint-plugin-svelte prettier-plugin-svelte`
Add scripts to package.json: build, dev, lint, check
Example: `bun run dev` starts dev server
Example: `bun run build` completes without errors
Negative case: missing tailwind config -> build fails

stories.title: Base layout with dark mode toggle
stories.description: As a user, I want a clean base layout with dark mode toggle so I can use my preferred theme.
acceptanceCriteria: Create App.svelte with centered container (max-width ~600px)
Add generous padding/whitespace matching Things 3 aesthetic
Add dark mode toggle button in top-right corner
Toggle adds/removes 'dark' class on html element
Persist theme preference to LocalStorage
Load saved preference on app init
Style both light and dark themes with Tailwind dark: variants
Example: click toggle -> theme switches with smooth transition
Example: refresh page -> theme persists
Negative case: LocalStorage cleared -> defaults to light mode

stories.title: Todo data store with LocalStorage
stories.description: As a user, I want my todos persisted so they survive page refresh.
acceptanceCriteria: Create todos store using Svelte writable store
Store shape: array of {id, title, completed, createdAt}
Generate unique IDs with crypto.randomUUID()
Subscribe to store changes and save to LocalStorage
Load from LocalStorage on app init
Export functions: addTodo, toggleTodo, deleteTodo, clearCompleted
Example: add todo -> appears in store and LocalStorage
Example: refresh page -> todos restored from LocalStorage
Negative case: corrupt LocalStorage JSON -> reset to empty array

stories.title: Todo input component
stories.description: As a user, I want an always-visible input at the bottom to add todos quickly.
acceptanceCriteria: Create TodoInput.svelte component
Fixed position at bottom of todo list area
Clean minimal styling matching Things 3
Placeholder text: 'Add a todo...'
Enter key submits and clears input
Escape key clears input without submitting
Empty submissions are ignored (no empty todos created)
Subtle focus ring styling
Example: type 'Buy milk' + Enter -> todo added, input cleared
Example: type 'test' + Escape -> input cleared, no todo added
Negative case: submit empty/whitespace -> nothing happens

stories.title: Active todo list display
stories.description: As a user, I want to see my active todos in a clean list.
acceptanceCriteria: Create TodoList.svelte component
Display active (not completed) todos
New todos appear at top of list
Each todo shows: checkbox + title
Checkbox is circular, Things 3 style
Generous vertical spacing between items
Hover state shows subtle background change
Example: 3 active todos -> all 3 displayed in order
Example: no active todos -> list area empty (no message)
Negative case: completed todos -> not shown in active list

stories.title: Complete todo interaction with animation
stories.description: As a user, I want to complete todos with satisfying animation feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: Click checkbox to toggle completion
Completing: checkbox fills with subtle animation
Completing: title gets strikethrough + fades
Completing: item slides down to completed section after brief delay
Use Svelte transitions (fly, fade) for animations
Animation duration ~300ms, eased
Example: click checkbox -> animation plays, moves to completed
Example: rapid clicks -> state toggles correctly
Negative case: uncompleting -> moves back to active list

stories.title: Completed section with clear button
stories.description: As a user, I want completed todos grouped at bottom with option to clear.
acceptanceCriteria: Completed todos appear in separate section below active
Section header: 'Completed' with count badge
Section only visible when completed todos exist
'Clear completed' button appears in section header
Clicking clear removes all completed todos with fade animation
Completed items show muted styling (lighter text, checked box)
Can uncheck to move back to active
Example: 2 completed todos -> section shows 'Completed (2)'
Example: click clear -> all completed removed, section hides
Negative case: no completed todos -> section not rendered

stories.title: Polish and final styling pass
stories.description: As a user, I want the app to feel polished and cohesive.
acceptanceCriteria: Review all spacing for Things 3 aesthetic consistency
Ensure all interactive elements have focus states
Smooth transitions on theme toggle
Add subtle shadow/border to main container
Typography: clean sans-serif, proper hierarchy
All animations feel smooth, not janky
Dark mode colors are comfortable, not harsh
Example: tab through app -> focus states visible
Example: toggle theme -> smooth color transition
Negative case: no jarring layout shifts during interactions
